182.question: Do they inspect their model to see if their model learned to associate image parts with words related to entities?
182.response: {'Answer': 'Yes. The authors use the word "monopoly" as an example. They show that the model associates the word "monopoly" with the image of a monopoly board.'}

183.question: Do they inspect their model to see if their model learned to associate image parts with words related to entities?
183.response: {'Answer': 'Yes. The authors inspect their model to see if their model learned to associate image parts with words related to entities. In particular, they visualize the attention weights between image regions and word tokens, and find that the model focuses on different parts of the image when predicting different words.'}
